substeps.plaintext: Defeat the Ruin Hunter in the ruin then read the "Incomplete writing"
substeps.markdown: Defeat the ◀Ruin Hunter▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Ruin_Hunter▷ in the ruin then read the "Incomplete writing"

substeps.plaintext: Find the 3 strange stones near the ruin. There will be large chunks of amber near them
substeps.markdown: Find the 3 strange stones near the ruin. There will be large chunks of amber near them

substeps.plaintext: Open the Precious Chest that spawns close to the "Incomplete writing"
substeps.markdown: Open the Precious Chest that spawns close to the "Incomplete writing"

steps.plaintext: Ask the locals of Qingce Village about the fragments
steps.markdown: Ask the locals of ◀Qingce Village▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Qingce_Village▷ about the fragments

steps.plaintext: Ask Granny Ruoxin about the fragments
Search for fragments near the Geo Statues
steps.markdown: Search for fragments near the Geo Statues

substeps.plaintext: Activate the statues in order: North, South East, North West, North East, South West
substeps.markdown: Activate the statues in order: North, South East, North West, North East, South West

steps.plaintext: Go to the highest point of Qingce Village to search for fragments
steps.markdown: Go to the highest point of Qingce Village to search for fragments

substeps.plaintext: Activate the statues in order, starting from the one facing Stormterror's Lair as the 1st, then go clockwise for the 3rd, 4th, and 6th
substeps.markdown: Activate the statues in order, starting from the one facing ◀Stormterror's Lair▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Stormterror%27s_Lair▷ as the 1st, then go clockwise for the 3rd, 4th, and 6th

steps.plaintext: Find a way into the vault
steps.markdown: Find a way into the vault

substeps.plaintext: Two Common Chests can be found inside the vault.
substeps.markdown: Two Common ◀Chests▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Chest▷ can be found inside the vault.

substeps.plaintext: Treasure Hoarders spawn as you get closer to the mechanism in the center of the room.
substeps.markdown: ◀Treasure Hoarders▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Treasure_Hoarders▷ spawn as you get closer to the mechanism in the center of the room.

substeps.plaintext: After interacting with the Qingce Cache mechanism, waves of monsters will attack while rocks fall down from the ceiling, dealing AoE Geo DMG. Your goal is to prevent them from destroying the structure.
substeps.markdown: After interacting with the Qingce Cache mechanism, waves of monsters will attack while rocks fall down from the ceiling, dealing AoE Geo DMG. Your goal is to prevent them from destroying the structure.

substeps.plaintext: There is a pool of water in the room so you can use that to cause elemental reactions on the enemies (Frozen, Electro-Charged, Vaporize and Bloom)
substeps.markdown: There is a pool of water in the room so you can use that to cause ◀elemental reactions▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Elemental_reactions▷ on the enemies (Frozen, Electro-Charged, Vaporize and Bloom)

substeps.plaintext: Continue towards the back of the room to find 1 Luxurious, 1 Precious, 2 Exquisite, and 2 Common Chests. There is also a Geoculus and a Seelie in the room.
substeps.markdown: Continue towards the back of the room to find 1 Luxurious, 1 Precious, 2 Exquisite, and 2 Common Chests. There is also a ◀Geoculus▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Geoculus▷ and a ◀Seelie▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Seelie▷ in the room.

steps.plaintext: Head to Qingce Village and report to Granny Ruoxin
steps.markdown: Head to Qingce Village and report to Granny Ruoxin
